cbinstall.name: pms.MyPMSPro
cbinstall.author: JoomlaJoe, Beat and Benjamin Zweifel
cbinstall.description: Provides the myPMS, PMS Pro, PMS Enhanced, JIM and uddeIM 0.4/1.0 integration for Community Builder.

param.name: pmsType
param.label: PMS Component type
param.description: Choose type of component installed. IMPORTANT: Component configuration must also be done!

param.name: pmsMenuText
param.label: PMS Send Menu/Link text
param.description: Default is _UE_PM_USER, the local translation of "Send Private Message"

param.name: pmsMenuDesc
param.label: PMS Send Menu/Link Description
param.description: Default is _UE_MENU_PM_USER_DESC, the local translation of "Send a Private Message to this user"

param.name: pmsMenuInboxText
param.label: PMS Inbox Menu/Link text
param.description: Default is _UE_PM_INBOX, the local translation of "Show Private Inbox"

param.name: pmsMenuInboxDesc
param.label: PMS Menu/Link Description
param.description: Default is _UE_MENU_PM_INBOX_DESC, the local translation of "Show Received Private Messages"

param.name: pmsMenuOutboxText
param.label: PMS Outbox Menu/Link text
param.description: Default is _UE_PM_OUTBOX, the local translation of "Show Private Outbox"

param.name: pmsMenuOutboxDesc
param.label: PMS Outbox Menu/Link Description
param.description: Default is _UE_MENU_PM_OUTBOX_DESC, the local translation of "Show Sent Private Messages"

param.name: pmsMenuTrashboxText
param.label: PMS Trash Menu/Link text
param.description: Default is _UE_PM_TRASHBOX, the local translation of "Show Trash"

param.name: pmsMenuTrashboxDesc
param.label: PMS Trash Menu/Link Description
param.description: Default is _UE_MENU_PM_TRASHBOX_DESC, the local translation of "Show Trashed Private Messages"

param.name: pmsMenuOptionsText
param.label: PMS Options Menu/Link text
param.description: Default is _UE_PM_OPTIONS, the local translation of "Show PMS Options"

param.name: pmsMenuOptionsDesc
param.label: PMS Options Menu/Link Description
param.description: Default is _UE_MENU_PM_OPTIONS_DESC, the local translation of "Show PMS Options"

param.name: pmsUserDeleteOption
param.label: PMS User Deletion
param.description: Choose how you want PMS messages to be handled when a user is removed

param.name: pmsUserFunction
param.label: PMS Deletion Function to use
param.description: Choose which function to be called when user is deleted (PMS component specific cleanup functions must be stored in cb_extra.php file in component root).

param.name: showTitle
param.label: Show Tab title
param.description: Show the title of the tab inside this tab. The description is also shown, if present. IMPORTANT: The title is the tab title here.

param.name: showSubject
param.label: Show Subject Field
param.description: Show the subject field. If hidden, subject will be "Message from your profile view" = _UE_PM_PROFILEMSG
